prompts:
review @docs-skill/ , invoke your cc-* skills, research the correctness of this plan. present to me your findings. next fix this in the plan: 1. Syntax Issues

CRITICAL - Frontmatter Missing Quotes:

text
# BAD (current in DOCS_SKILL.md):
name: codebase-documentation
description: Research and document...
tools: Bash, Read, Write, Grep

# GOOD (should be):
---
name: codebase-documentation
description: Research and document...
tools: Bash, Read, Write, Grep
---
All skill and agent files need proper YAML frontmatter wrapped in --- delimiters.

Then research our current agents in our directories, find which tools they have, update the tools in the subagent doc for each planned subagent to have correct and comprehensive tool coverage for there task.
4. Output Location Inconsistencies

Subagent templates use mixed path formats:

bash
# Some use:
.claude/brains/TOPIC/.temp/phase1-discovery/

# Some use:
.claude/brains/[topic]/.temp/phase1-discovery/

# Should standardize to:
[project]/.claude/brains/[topic]/.temp/phase1-discovery/
All 11 subagents should use consistent placeholder syntax (either [topic] or TOPIC, pick one).


After updating the docs fixing these 3 issues i highlighted, present to me your findings of other issues if any you identified.
